h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: This leads up to yet another Dragonfly Guai archer overlooking the gate who will ambush you if you try to attack the snake or his other archer friend.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Blooms'.
The content is as follows:
This leads up to yet another Dragonfly Guai archer overlooking the gate who will ambush you if you try to attack the snake or his other archer friend.
